string.text:
An automatic mag–fed shotgun born in and tailored to the specific needs of the Zone. Its high rate of fire, large magazine and unparalleled ergonomics have granted it the nickname "Bloodsucker Killer". It is considered as one of the finest 12x70mm weapons available in the Zone.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Ukraine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Unknown
